articles.title: Conference of WPK to Be Held Sep. 28
articles.content:
Conference of WPK to Be Held Sep. 28
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The Preparatory Committee for the Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea made public as follows as regards the party conference:
					 The meetings of delegates of the party committees of the Korean People's Army and provincial (political bureau), city (district) and county party committees took place to elect delegates to the conference of the WPK against the background of a high-pitched drive for effecting a new great revolutionary surge now under way on all fronts for building a thriving nation with the historic conference of the WPK and its 65th birthday approaching. 
					
					 The meetings of delegates of the party committees of the KPA and provincial (political bureau) party committees elected General Secretary Kim Jong Il as delegate to the conference of the WPK representing the unanimous will of all the members of the party, servicepersons of the KPA and people.
					
					 The meetings elected working people and officials who have displayed patriotic devotion at the work sites for effecting a fresh revolutionary surge, remaining intensely loyal to the party and revolution as delegates to the conference.
					
					 The meetings once again powerfully demonstrated the might of our revolutionary ranks in which all the servicepersons and people are single-mindedly united around the headquarters of the revolution headed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The conference of the WPK for electing its supreme leadership body will take place in Pyongyang on Sept. 28.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of O Tae Hyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of O Tae Hyong
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of the late O Tae Hyong, sculptor of the Mansudae Art Studio who is a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, labor hero and people's artist, on Tuesday, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Malian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Malian President
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Amadou Toumani Toure, president of the Republic of Mali, on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of its proclamation.
					 Kim in the message noted that the Malian people have made great progress in their efforts to consolidate the country's sovereignty and achieve the nation's prosperity and positively contributed to the stability and development of the region for the last five decades since the proclamation of their republic.
					
					 Expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger, the message sincerely wished the president greater success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Armenian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Armenian President
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Serge Sarkissian, president of Armenia, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Armenia would continue to develop and wished the Armenian people well-being and prosperity.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets Belizean PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets Belizean PM
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Dean Barrow, prime minister of Belize, on the occasion of the 29th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would continue to develop favorably and wished him and the government of Belize successes in their work for the prosperity of the country and well-being of its people.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets Peruvian Ambassador
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets Peruvian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Harold Forsyth, new Peruvian ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him on Tuesday.

articles.title: Credentials of Peruvian Ambassador Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of Peruvian Ambassador Accepted
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Harold Forsyth, Peruvian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					 After accepting the credentials, Kim had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Communist Party of Great Britain Delegation Here
articles.content:
Communist Party of Great Britain Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) led by General Secretary Zane Carpenter arrived here Tuesday.
					 Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, who doubles as director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, left here on the same day.

articles.title: Pyongyang Film Festival Draws Large Audience
articles.content:
Pyongyang Film Festival Draws Large Audience
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The 12th Pyongyang International Film Festival that opened on Sept. 17 is drawing large audience everyday.
					Feature films, documentaries, short films and films for children produced in different countries in recent years are being shown and films highly appreciated at other international film festivals are specially screened during the festival.
					
					The Pyongyang International Cinema House and other venues of the festival are crowded with cinema-goers. 
					
					Among the audiences were participants in the festival and staff members of foreign embassies here.

articles.title: Women's Football Match Held between DPRK, UK
articles.content:
Women's Football Match Held between DPRK, UK
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- A friendly football match between the Kalmaegi Women's Team of the DPRK and the visiting Middlesbrough Football Club Ladies' Team, UK, was held in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 The Korean girls won the match 5:0.
					
					 The two friendly matches, held in Pyongyang to mark the tenth anniversary of the opening of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and UK, marked a good occasion in invigorating exchange and cooperation between the two peoples and developing physical culture.

articles.title: Guarantee for Accomplishment of Revolution
articles.content:
Guarantee for Accomplishment of Revolution
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- It is the greatest of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk's exploits to provide a definite guarantee for successfully carrying forward the Korean revolution through generations.
					 A few years before the victory of the Korean people in the anti-Japanese struggle, she gave birth to General Secretary Kim Jong Il and brought him up in battlefields and in the period of the building of new Korea. 
					
					 She dedicated her all to making him, born with a rare disposition, possess excellent traits and qualifications, as befitted a son of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 When he asked her where his native place was, she answered it was Mt. Paektu and that Paektu became more famous as a holy mountain of the revolution since President Kim Il Sung triumphantly waged a hard-fought struggle against the Japanese imperialists there.
					
					 Listening to her, Kim Jong Il resolved to become a fine revolutionary, like the President, devoting himself to the country and people.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk used to accompany the President with her son in his field guidance tour so that he might learn from the noble traits of the President.
					
					 She always encouraged him to think and act in an ambitious and big way and, once determined, do it thoroughly, cultivating upright and righteous traits. 
					
					 She also taught him the truth of life that one enjoys happiness when devotedly working for others. 
					
					 Now in Korea the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of Songun pioneered by the President, is being successfully carried forward under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: US Scheme to Stage Joint Drills under Fire
articles.content:
US Scheme to Stage Joint Drills under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is scheming to stage the joint military exercises for aggression with the south Korean warmongers at any cost by introducing a nuclear-powered aircraft carrier and latest military equipment into the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity.
					 In this regard Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a signed commentary:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' scheme to get the nuclear-powered carrier "George Washington" involved in the combined anti-submarine drill to be launched in the West Sea of Korea by them is to make the joint military exercises a nuclear war rehearsal.
					
					 The U.S. is going to persistently stage the joint military exercises despite the protest and denunciation of people at home and abroad. Lurking behind such moves is an intention to contain other big powers by force of arms.
					
					 It is indisputable that through the exercises the U.S. seeks to establish its military hegemony over Northeast Asia and put this region under its control by force.
					
					 A serious situation, in which an all-out war may break out by any accident, is now prevailing in the Korean Peninsula. However, the U.S. war maniacs are ceaselessly beefing up armed forces and staging war games in this acute hotspot, which may drive the situation to an unpredictable grave phase.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK can never remain an onlooker to the fact that the U.S. imperialists are posing a serious threat to its sovereignty while mobilizing huge armed forces to conduct a three-dimensional attack operation.
					
					 They who have bolstered up their war deterrent in every way by dint of Songun will go all-out to display the stamina of the DPRK if the enemies dare provoke.
					
					 The U.S. should renounce the daydream to realize its wild design for aggression through the anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: US Accused of Trumpeting about Missile "Threat"
articles.content:
US Accused of Trumpeting about Missile "Threat"
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Recently, a high-ranking officer of the U.S. military, ballyhooing about missile "threat" to the U.S. from somebody, blustered that in case the U.S. comes under a missile attack, it is capable of shooting it down. He underscored the need to comprehend capabilities and intentions of those states which pose a threat to the U.S. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such remarks are sheer nonsense. There are countries exposed to military threat from the U.S. in the world, but no country threatens the U.S. by force of arms.
					
					  Citing facts to prove that the U.S. has put spurs to the arms buildup and the modernization of armed forces in a bid to dominate the world by force of arms and threatened other countries militarily, the commentary goes on:
					
					A particular mention should be made of the fact that  the U.S. has steadily escalated the military threat to the DPRK, rendering the situation tenser.
					
					 Entering this year, the U.S. groundlessly linked the south Korean puppet warship case with the DPRK and has massively shipped nuclear weapons and equipment into the areas around the Korean Peninsula and escalated the exercises for a nuclear war to stifle the DPRK by force of arms under this pretext.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is so tense that a war may break out any moment and peace and security in the Asia-Pacific region are exposed to a serious threat.
					
					 The U.S. moves for a war of aggression pose a direct threat to the peace and security not only in the Asia-Pacific but in the Middle East and Europe and the rest of the world. 
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. is the chieftain of an arms race and the arch criminal threatening and disturbing the global peace and security.
					
					 The U.S. is loudmouthed about somebody's military "threat" like a thief crying "Stop the thief!" This is a revelation of consciousness of anachronistic confrontation and war hysteria and no more than a subterfuge to justify its mean policy of war of aggression.

articles.title: Air Exercise Staged by S. Korean Air Force under Fire
articles.content:
Air Exercise Staged by S. Korean Air Force under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The puppet air force of south Korea made various type aircraft including F-15K fly over Seoul from Sept. 16, whipping up war hysteria.
					 This exercise aimed to reenact the situation in the period of the last June 25 war continued till Sept. 18.
					
					 The south Korean puppet war maniacs are pushing the situation to the worst phase by escalating the confrontation with the DPRK and inciting war atmosphere.

articles.title: Inspection of State Called for Probe into "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Inspection of State Called for Probe into "Cheonan"
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The "joint action for a probe into the truth about Cheonan case and peace on the Korean Peninsula" grouping more than 40 civic and public organizations including the Solidarity for Progress, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the "People for Achieving Peace and Reunification" of south Korea issued a written protest on Sept. 16 demanding the inspection of state administration for a probe into the truth behind the warship case.
					 The written protest pointed out that the final report on the case opened to the public by the Ministry of Defense failed to convince the people and, on the contrary, it added to the doubts and questions about the case.
					
					 Majority of people are waging a ceaseless signature campaign in demand of a correct probe into the case, it noted.
					
					 The protest held that the "National Assembly" had better immediately come out for inspection of state administration for clarifying the case, though belatedly.
					
					 That day representatives of the organizations submitted the protest to the speaker of the puppet National Assembly.
					
					 Meanwhile, Sin Sang Chol who was a member of the former joint investigation team, laid bare the hypocritical nature of the final report released by the puppet Ministry of Defense on the warship case. He claimed it was illogical for the Ministry of Defense to talk about what it called signs and evidence and the like after keeping all necessary information in top secrecy, not allowing any contact with survivors.
					
					 He held it is necessary to open to the public what happened at that time and all information about it and let the witnesses to speak freely if the cause of the case is to be correctly investigated. Refusing to do so would provide evidence proving the fabrication, distortion and cover-up, he added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Mexico
 Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea released the 64th issue of its bulletin to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of immortal guidance at Kim Il Sung University.
					 The bulletin carried a picture of Kim Jong Il and an article titled "Ideal of HE Kim Jong Il", which said: 
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il of the DPRK recited poem "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee" on September 1, 1960 when he was enrolled at Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 As one can read through the title of the poem, it was the ideal that he cherished in his early years to glorify Korea to the whole world.
					
					 Succeeding to the cause of President Kim Il Sung, he mapped out a plan to build in Korea a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation whose strength is inexhaustible and where everything thrives and the people lead a happy life with nothing more to need.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of Kim Jong Il to certainly open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of the President. 
					
					 Noting that his energetic leadership has brought about epoch-making changes one after another in various fields of the national economy of the DPRK in recent years, the bulletin further said:
					
					 The international community keenly realizes that Kim Il Sung's lifelong desire and Kim Jong Il's ideal are being translated into reality in the DPRK with the 2012 approaching.
					
					 The DPRK will demonstrate its might as a thriving socialist nation as intended by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- One January day in Juche 64 (1975) General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il was told by an official that two students met an accident to be seriously burnt.
					 Kim Jong Il told him that all potentialities available in the medical circles should be mobilized to save them from death.
					
					 He then took measures to directly transport everything needed for their operations to the spot.
					
					 Encouraged by his human love, medical workers successfully conducted with the utmost care 32 operations taking more than 140 hours for over 10 days to save the patients' lives. 
					
					 After the operations, Kim Jong Il sent high-priced tonics and fresh fruits to the patients.
					
					 The medical workers were much touched by his great love for the two students.

articles.title: Se convocara el dia 28 la Conferencia del PTC
articles.content:
Se convocara el dia 28 la Conferencia del PTC
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El comite preparatorio para la Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea anuncio, en relacion con esta confernecia, como sigue:
					Tuvieron lugar la reunion de los delegados del partido del Ejercito Popular de Corea del PTC y las reuniones de los delegados del partido de las provincias (direcciones politicas), las ciudades (municipios) y los distritos para elegir a los delegados de la Conferencia del PTC en medio de que se eleva furiosamente el ambiente de nuevos y grandes auges revolucionarios en todos los sectores de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera en visperas de la citada Conferencia historica y el 65o aniversario de la fundacion, del PTC.
					
					 Las reuniones de los delegados del EPC y de las provincias (direcciones politicas) del PTC eligieron unanimemente al camarada Kim Jong Il, gran Dirigente de nuestro partido y de nuestro pueblo como delegado de la Conferencia del PTC reflejando la unanime voluntad de todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes.
					
					Tambien en las ocasiones fueron electos como delegados de dicha conferencia los trabajadores y los funcionarios quienes quedan fieles al partido y la revolucion y ponen de manifiesto la abnegacion patriotica en los lugares donde se registran nuevos y grandes auges revolucionarios.
					
					Las reuniones volvieron a demostrar con vigor el poderio de la unidad monolitica de nuestras filas revolucionarias, o sea, entre todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion encabezada por el Dirigente.
					
					Se inaugurara el dia 28 en Pyongyang la Conferencia del PTC para la eleccion de su maximo organo directivo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto O Tae Hyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro de difunto O Tae Hyong
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 21 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto O Tae Hyong, laureado con el Premio Kim Il Sung, heroe del Trabajo y artista del Pueblo, quien era escultor de la Casa de Creacion Mansudae, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador peruano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de embajador peruano 
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Harold Forsyth presento el dia 21 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, las cartas credenciales que le acreditan como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Peruana en Corea.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el embajador.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia plan de ejercicio militar conjunto
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia plan de ejercicio militar conjunto
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El periodico Rodong Sinmun divulgo en su edicion de este martes un comentario individual denunciando a Estados Unidos que planea librar a toda costa junto con los belicistas surcoreanos los ejercicios militares conjuntos de caracter agresivo movilizando el portaaviones nuclear y otros equipos militares ultramodernos a ser introducidos en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno.
					 Ahora los imperialistas norteamericanos intentan movilizar el gran portaaviones nuclear "George Washington" en el ejercicio conjunto antisubmarinos, que se realizara en el Mar Oeste de Corea, con el fin de convertir este entrenamiento en el ensayo de guerra nuclear, revela el comentarista y continua:
					
					 Pese a la protesta y el rechazo levantados dentro y fuera del pais, EE.UU. pretende ejecutarlo a toda costa partiendo de su implicito intento de presionar por via militar y mantener a raya a otras potencias.
					
					  Es indiscutible que el objetivo de tal ejercicio fuera establecer el dominio militar sobre el Nordeste Asiatico y controlarlo a su antojo con las fuerzas. 
					
					  Ahora en la Peninsula Coreana se da una situacion tan peligrosa que puede causar la guerra por cualquier factor accidental.
					
					  Si los belicistas norteamericanos siguen aumentando las fuerzas armadas y librando los ejercicios belicos en esa zona tan candente y aguda, la situacion llegara a una fase de imprevisible desenlace.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea no pueden estar jamas con brazos cruzados ante tal proceder de los imperialistas yanquis que amenazan gravemente la soberania de la RPDC desarrollando la operacion de ataque tridimensional con las colosales fuerzas armadas.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos, que han fortalecido por todos los medios el disuasivo de guerra con el Songun, demostraran el temperamento de Corea usando todas sus fuerzas si los enemigos se atreven a desatar la guerra.
					
					  EE.UU. debe abandonar su ilusion de agredir a la RPDC al cabo de practicar su anacronica politica hostil contra ella.

articles.title: Minju Joson desmiente el rumor de la "amenaza" de misiles
articles.content:
Minju Joson desmiente el rumor de la "amenaza" de misiles
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Hace poco, al referirse a la "amenaza" de misiles de alguien, un alto funcionario del circulo militar norteamericano senalo que en caso de que haya un ataque de misiles contra Estados Unidos, este sabra derribarlos. Al mismo tiempo, abogo por la necesidad de conocer la capacidad y el intento de los Estados que representan una "amenaza" para EE.UU.
					Es un disparate tan absurdo porque en este mundo si hay los paises amenazados militarmente por EE.UU., pero, no hay los que lo amenazan de la misma manera.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este martes y continua:
					
					Hay de sobra los datos reveladores de que EE.UU. amenaza militarmente a otros paises recurriendo al aumento armamentista y la modernizacion de fuerzas armadas para dominar el mundo con ellas.
					
					En particular, EE.UU. agrava la situacion de Corea intensificando gradualmente la amenaza militar sobre la RPDC.
					
					Solo en este ano, al vincular absurdamente con la RPDC el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan", el imperio introduce en gran medida los equipos belicos nucleares en las cercanias de la Peninsula Coreana y amplia de modo escalonado los ejercicios de guerra nuclear para aplastar militarmente a la RPDC.
					
					Por lo tanto, en la Peninsula Coreana se crea la peor fase que puede dar lugar a la guerra en cualquier momento y se ven amenazadas gravemente la paz y la seguridad de la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Las maniobras de EE.UU. para la guerra de agresion amenazan la paz y la seguridad no solo de Asia-Pacifico sino tambien de otras regiones del mundo, incluyendo el Medio Oriente y Europa.
					
					Todos los hechos comprueban que este imperio es el promotor principal de la carrera armamentista y el culpable que amenaza y destruye la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					La "amenaza" militar de alguien, de que habla tanto EE.UU., es una expresion de su conciencia conflictiva y fanatismo por la guerra y un pretexto para justificar su sucia politica de agresion y guerra.
